title: Caught by the tide
description: Could Becky’s life get any worse? Finding out her fiancé had been unfaithful on her wedding day was bad enough. Now her holiday in Cornwall is being ruined by a group of lads on a stag weekend. All she wants is to be left in peace to lick her wounds. Is that too much to ask? But when the tide rolls in and leaves her stranded on the beach, assistance arrives from a most unexpected quarter...
author: Emma Lilly
